SELECT TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE AS JOB_STATUS, GETICOMCODE3(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE, 'M401', TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE) AS JOB_STATUS_TXT, TRHD.PAY_NO, TRHD.ADD_DATE AS PAY_DATE, GETUSERNAMELOC (TRHD.HOUSE_CODE, TRHD.ADD_USER_ID) AS ADD_USER_NAME, TRHD.VENDOR_CODE, GETCOMPANYNAMELOC(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE,TRHD.VENDOR_CODE,'S') AS VENDOR_NAME, COUNT(TRDT.PAY_NO) AS ITEM_COUNT, SUM(TRDT.ITEM_QTY) AS ITEM_QTY, TRHD.PAY_AMT, IVHD.PURCHASE_ID, GETUSERNAMELOC(IVHD.HOUSE_CODE,IVHD.PURCHASE_ID) AS PURCHASE_NAME, DECODE(TXHD.BUYER_REJECT_REMARK,'','N','Y') AS REJECT_REASON_FLAG, TXHD.BUYER_REJECT_REMARK AS REJECT_REASON, TXHD.TAX_NO, WBSINF.WBS, WBSINF.WBS_NAME FROM ICOYTRHD TRHD, ICOYTRDT TRDT, ICOYIVHD IVHD ,ICOYTXHD TXHD, (SELECT DISTINCT PO.HOUSE_CODE, PO.PO_NO, PJTH.PJT_SEQ AS WBS, PJTH.PJT_CODE AS WBS_CODE, PJTH.PJT_NAME AS WBS_NAME FROM ICOYPODT PO, ICOYPRHD PR, ICOYPJTH PJTH WHERE PO.HOUSE_CODE = PR.HOUSE_CODE AND PO.PR_NO = PR.PR_NO AND PR.HOUSE_CODE = PJTH.HOUSE_CODE (+) AND PR.WBS = PJTH.PJT_SEQ (+) )WBSINF
WHERE TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRHD.PAY_NO = TRDT.PAY_NO AND TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = IVHD.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.INV_NO = IVHD.INV_NO AND TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXHD.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXHD.TAX_NO AND TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = WBSINF.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.PO_NO = WBSINF.PO_NO
<OPT=F,S> AND TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND TRHD.ADD_DATE BETWEEN ? </OPT><OPT=S,S>AND ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND TRHD.VENDOR_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND TRHD.PAY_NO = ? </OPT> /* AND TRHD.JOB_STATUS = 'V' */ AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE = 'V' GROUP BY TRHD.HOUSE_CODE, TRHD.PAY_NO, TRHD.ADD_DATE, TRHD.ADD_USER_ID, TRHD.VENDOR_CODE, TRHD.COM_PERSON_FLAG, TRHD.PAY_AMT, TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE, TXHD.BUYER_REJECT_REMARK, IVHD.HOUSE_CODE, IVHD.PURCHASE_ID, TXHD.HOUSE_CODE, TXHD.TAX_NO, WBSINF.WBS, WBSINF.WBS_NAME
SELECT TXHD.TAX_NO, TXHD.BUYER_REJECT_REMARK FROM ICOYTXHD TXHD WHERE TXHD.HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND TXHD.TAX_NO = '#tax_no#'

UPDATE ICOYTXHD SET CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), CHANGE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), CHANGE_USER_ID = '#user_id#', PROGRESS_CODE = '#progress_code#'
,PAY_DEMAND_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ,PAY_DEMAND_FLAG = 'Y'
,SIGN_STATUS = 'T' ,PAY_DEMAND_DATE = '' ,PAY_END_DATE = ''
WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND TAX_NO = '#tax_no#'
SELECT TAX_NO , PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY2GL WHERE APP_STATUS_CD = 'E' #addStr#
SELECT TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,PAY_ACT_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY2GL WHERE 1 = 1 #addStr# UNION ALL SELECT TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,PAY_SEND_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY1LN WHERE 1 = 1 #addStr2#

SELECT TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,PAY_ACT_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY2GL WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAX_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE INV_NO IN (SELECT INV_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE 1 = 1 #addStr# )) UNION ALL SELECT B.TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,B.PAY_SEND_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY1GL A ,SPY1LN B WHERE A.PAY_SEND_NO = B.PAY_SEND_NO
AND A.DEL_YN <> 'Y'
AND B.TAX_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE INV_NO IN (SELECT INV_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE 1 = 1 #addStr2# ))

SELECT TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,PAY_ACT_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY2GL WHERE 1 = 1 #addStr# UNION ALL SELECT B.TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,B.PAY_SEND_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY1GL A ,SPY1LN B WHERE A.PAY_SEND_NO = B.PAY_SEND_NO
AND A.DEL_YN <> 'Y'
#addStr2#

SELECT TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,PAY_ACT_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY2GL WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAX_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE INV_NO IN (SELECT INV_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE 1 = 1 #addStr# )) UNION ALL SELECT B.TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,B.PAY_SEND_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO FROM SPY1GL A ,SPY1LN B WHERE A.PAY_SEND_NO = B.PAY_SEND_NO
AND A.DEL_YN <> 'Y'
AND B.TAX_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE INV_NO IN (SELECT INV_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE 1 = 1 #addStr2# )) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO , '' AS PAY_ACT_NO ,'준경상비' AS KTGRM_NM FROM ( SELECT TXHD.TAX_NO ,TXDT.TAX_SEQ ,TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE ,( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SPY1LN PYLN INNER JOIN SPY1GL PYGL ON PYLN.HOUSE_CODE = PYGL.HOUSE_CODE AND PYLN.PAY_SEND_NO = PYGL.PAY_SEND_NO WHERE PYLN.HOUSE_CODE = TXDT.HOUSE_CODE AND PYLN.TAX_NO = TXDT.TAX_NO AND PYLN.TAX_SEQ = TXDT.TAX_SEQ AND PYGL.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS PY_CNT
FROM ICOYTRHD TRHD INNER JOIN ICOYTRDT TRDT ON TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRHD.PAY_NO = TRDT.PAY_NO INNER JOIN ICOYPODT PODT ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = PODT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.PO_NO = PODT.PO_NO AND TRDT.PO_SEQ = PODT.PO_SEQ INNER JOIN ICOYTXHD TXHD ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXHD.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXHD.TAX_NO INNER JOIN ICOYTXDT TXDT ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXDT.TAX_NO AND TRDT.TAX_SEQ = TXDT.TAX_SEQ WHERE TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('P','E') AND TXHD.KTGRM = '04' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE LIKE '%' || 'E' || '%' #addStr3# ) WHERE PY_CNT = 0 UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO , '' AS PAY_ACT_NO ,'용도품/중요증서' AS KTGRM_NM FROM ( SELECT TXHD.TAX_NO, TXDT.TAX_SEQ, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SPY1LN PYLN INNER JOIN SPY1GL PYGL ON PYLN.HOUSE_CODE = PYGL.HOUSE_CODE AND PYLN.PAY_SEND_NO = PYGL.PAY_SEND_NO WHERE PYLN.HOUSE_CODE = TXDT.HOUSE_CODE AND PYLN.TAX_NO = TXDT.TAX_NO AND PYLN.TAX_SEQ = TXDT.TAX_SEQ AND PYGL.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS PY_CNT FROM ICOYTRHD TRHD INNER JOIN ICOYTRDT TRDT ON TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRHD.PAY_NO = TRDT.PAY_NO INNER JOIN ICOYPODT PODT ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = PODT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.PO_NO = PODT.PO_NO AND TRDT.PO_SEQ = PODT.PO_SEQ INNER JOIN ICOYTXHD TXHD ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXHD.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXHD.TAX_NO INNER JOIN ICOYTXDT TXDT ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXDT.TAX_NO AND TRDT.TAX_SEQ = TXDT.TAX_SEQ WHERE TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('P','E') AND TXHD.KTGRM = '05' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE LIKE '%' || 'E' || '%' #addStr4# ) WHERE PY_CNT = 0

SELECT TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,PAY_ACT_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO ,'경상비' AS KTGRM_NM FROM SPY2GL WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAX_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE INV_NO IN (SELECT INV_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAX_NO = ${TAX_NO} )) UNION ALL SELECT B.TAX_NO AS TAX_NO ,B.PAY_SEND_NO AS PAY_ACT_NO ,'자본예산' AS KTGRM_NM FROM SPY1GL A ,SPY1LN B WHERE A.PAY_SEND_NO = B.PAY_SEND_NO
AND A.DEL_YN <> 'Y'
AND B.TAX_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE INV_NO IN (SELECT INV_NO FROM ICOYTRDT WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAX_NO = ${TAX_NO} )) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO , '' AS PAY_ACT_NO ,'준경상비' AS KTGRM_NM FROM ( SELECT TXHD.TAX_NO ,TXDT.TAX_SEQ ,TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE ,( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SPY1LN PYLN INNER JOIN SPY1GL PYGL ON PYLN.HOUSE_CODE = PYGL.HOUSE_CODE AND PYLN.PAY_SEND_NO = PYGL.PAY_SEND_NO WHERE PYLN.HOUSE_CODE = TXDT.HOUSE_CODE AND PYLN.TAX_NO = TXDT.TAX_NO AND PYLN.TAX_SEQ = TXDT.TAX_SEQ AND PYGL.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS PY_CNT
FROM ICOYTRHD TRHD INNER JOIN ICOYTRDT TRDT ON TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRHD.PAY_NO = TRDT.PAY_NO INNER JOIN ICOYPODT PODT ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = PODT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.PO_NO = PODT.PO_NO AND TRDT.PO_SEQ = PODT.PO_SEQ INNER JOIN ICOYTXHD TXHD ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXHD.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXHD.TAX_NO INNER JOIN ICOYTXDT TXDT ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXDT.TAX_NO AND TRDT.TAX_SEQ = TXDT.TAX_SEQ WHERE TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('P','E') AND TXHD.KTGRM = '04' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE LIKE '%' || 'E' || '%' AND TXHD.TAX_NO = ${TAX_NO} ) WHERE PY_CNT = 0 UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT TAX_NO , '' AS PAY_ACT_NO ,'용도품/중요증서' AS KTGRM_NM FROM ( SELECT TXHD.TAX_NO, TXDT.TAX_SEQ, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SPY1LN PYLN INNER JOIN SPY1GL PYGL ON PYLN.HOUSE_CODE = PYGL.HOUSE_CODE AND PYLN.PAY_SEND_NO = PYGL.PAY_SEND_NO WHERE PYLN.HOUSE_CODE = TXDT.HOUSE_CODE AND PYLN.TAX_NO = TXDT.TAX_NO AND PYLN.TAX_SEQ = TXDT.TAX_SEQ AND PYGL.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS PY_CNT FROM ICOYTRHD TRHD INNER JOIN ICOYTRDT TRDT ON TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRHD.PAY_NO = TRDT.PAY_NO INNER JOIN ICOYPODT PODT ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = PODT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.PO_NO = PODT.PO_NO AND TRDT.PO_SEQ = PODT.PO_SEQ INNER JOIN ICOYTXHD TXHD ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXHD.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXHD.TAX_NO INNER JOIN ICOYTXDT TXDT ON TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = TXDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.TAX_NO = TXDT.TAX_NO AND TRDT.TAX_SEQ = TXDT.TAX_SEQ WHERE TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('P','E') AND TXHD.KTGRM = '05' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE LIKE '%' || 'E' || '%' AND TXHD.TAX_NO = ${TAX_NO} ) WHERE PY_CNT = 0

UPDATE ICOYTXHD SET CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), CHANGE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), CHANGE_USER_ID = '#user_id#',
BUYER_REJECT_REMARK = '#buyerRejectRemark#'
WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND TAX_NO = '#tax_no#'

UPDATE ICOYTXHD SET CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), CHANGE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), CHANGE_USER_ID = '#user_id#', PAY_END_DATE = '#pay_end_date_list#', SIGN_STATUS = '#sign_status#' WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND TAX_NO = '#tax_no#'
UPDATE ICOYTXHD SET SIGN_STATUS = ? ,SIGN_DATE = ? WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ? AND TAX_NO = ?
UPDATE ICOYTXHD SET PROGRESS_CODE = ? WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ? AND TAX_NO = ?

SELECT TXDT.BUY_DATE, TXDT.ITEM_CODE, TXDT.ITEM_DESC, TXDT.ITEM_SPEC, TXDT.ITEM_QTY, TXDT.UNIT_PRICE, TXDT.SUP_AMT, (SELECT DECODE(TAX_DIV,'1',TXDT.VAT_AMT,0) FROM ICOYTRHD WHERE HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND PAY_NO = TRDT.PAY_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) AS VAT_AMT, PRDT.ACCOUNT_TYPE, TXDT.REMARK FROM ICOYTXDT TXDT, ICOYTRDT TRDT, ICOYPODT PODT, ICOYPRDT PRDT WHERE TXDT.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TXDT.TAX_NO = TRDT.TAX_NO AND TXDT.TAX_SEQ = TRDT.TAX_SEQ AND TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = PODT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.PO_NO = PODT.PO_NO AND TRDT.PO_SEQ = PODT.PO_SEQ AND PODT.HOUSE_CODE = PRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND PODT.PR_NO = PRDT.PR_NO AND PODT.PR_SEQ = PRDT.PR_SEQ AND TXDT.HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND TXDT.TAX_NO = '#tax_no#' ORDER BY TXDT.TAX_SEQ

UPDATE ICOYTXHD SET CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), CHANGE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), CHANGE_USER_ID = '#user_id#', TAX_APP_NO = '#tax_app_no#', TAX_DATE = '#tax_date#', ATTACH_NO = '#attach_no#' WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND TAX_NO = '#tax_no#'

SELECT DISTINCT TXHD.TAX_NO, /* 세금계산서 번호 */ TXHD.TAX_APP_NO, /* 승인번호 */ TXHD.TAX_DATE, /* 발행일자 */ TXHD.ADD_DATE, /* 작성일자 */ TRHD.TAX_DIV, /* 과세구분 */ GETICOMCODE1(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE,'M400',TRHD.TAX_DIV) AS TAX_DIV_TXT, /* 과세구분 */ TXHD.SUP_AMT, /* 공급가액 */ DECODE(TRHD.TAX_DIV,1,SUM(TRDT.TAX_AMT),0) AS TAX_AMT, TXHD.SUP_AMT + DECODE(TRHD.TAX_DIV,1,SUM(TRDT.TAX_AMT),0) AS TOT_AMT, TRHD.PAY_NO, TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE, GETICOMCODE3(TXHD.HOUSE_CODE,'M401',TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE) AS PROGRESS_CODE_TXT, DECODE(TXHD.BUYER_REJECT_REMARK,'','N','Y') AS REJECT_REASON_FLAG, TXHD.BUYER_REJECT_REMARK AS REJECT_REASON, WBSINF.WBS, WBSINF.WBS_NAME FROM ICOYTXHD TXHD, ICOYTRHD TRHD, ICOYTRDT TRDT, (SELECT DISTINCT PO.HOUSE_CODE, PO.PO_NO, PJTH.PJT_SEQ AS WBS, PJTH.PJT_CODE AS WBS_CODE, PJTH.PJT_NAME AS WBS_NAME FROM ICOYPODT PO, ICOYPRHD PR, ICOYPJTH PJTH WHERE PO.HOUSE_CODE = PR.HOUSE_CODE AND PO.PR_NO = PR.PR_NO AND PR.HOUSE_CODE = PJTH.HOUSE_CODE (+) AND PR.WBS = PJTH.PJT_SEQ (+) )WBSINF
WHERE TXHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRHD.HOUSE_CODE AND TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRHD.PAY_NO = TRDT.PAY_NO AND TXHD.TAX_NO = TRDT.TAX_NO AND TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = WBSINF.HOUSE_CODE AND TRDT.PO_NO = WBSINF.PO_NO AND TXHD.HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND TXHD.COMPANY_CODE = '#company_code#' AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('D','I','C','R','B','O','E','P') <OPT=S,S> AND TXHD.TAX_DATE BETWEEN ? </OPT><OPT=S,S>AND ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND TXHD.TAX_APP_NO = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND TRHD.TAX_DIV = ? </OPT>
GROUP BY TXHD.HOUSE_CODE, TXHD.TAX_NO, /* 세금계산서 번호 */ TXHD.TAX_APP_NO, /* 승인번호 */ TXHD.TAX_DATE, /* 발행일자 */ TXHD.ADD_DATE, /* 작성일자 */ TRHD.HOUSE_CODE, TRHD.TAX_DIV, /* 과세구분 */ TXHD.SUP_AMT, /* 공급가액 */ TRHD.PAY_NO, TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE, TXHD.BUYER_REJECT_REMARK, WBSINF.WBS, WBSINF.WBS_NAME
ORDER BY TXHD.ADD_DATE DESC, TXHD.TAX_NO DESC

SELECT TRDT.INV_NO, TRDT.INV_SEQ, TRDT.PO_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRHD.ADD_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS ADD_DATE, TXHD.TAX_NO, TRHD.PAY_NO, TRHD.VENDOR_CODE, GETCOMPANYNAMELOC(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE,TRHD.VENDOR_CODE,'S') AS VENDOR_NAME, TXHD.SUP_IRS_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TXHD.TAX_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') TAX_DATE, CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NULL THEN BILL.NTS_ISSUEID ELSE TXHD.TAX_APP_NO END AS TAX_APP_NO,
CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NULL THEN 'RP' ELSE 'P' END AS TAX_GUBUN,
TRHD.TAX_DIV, GETICOMCODE1(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE,'M400',TRHD.TAX_DIV) AS TAX_DIV_TXT, TXHD.SUP_AMT, TXHD.VAT_AMT AS TAX_AMT, TXHD.SUP_AMT + TXHD.VAT_AMT AS TOT_AMT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TXHD.PAY_DEMAND_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') PAY_DEMAND_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TXHD.PAY_END_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') PAY_END_DATE, CASE WHEN TRHD.REF_PAY_NO IS NULL THEN ( CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '-1' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ICOYTRHD WHERE PAY_NO IN ( SELECT REF_PAY_NO FROM ICOYTRHD WHERE REF_PAY_NO IS NOT NULL AND REF_PAY_NO = TRHD.PAY_NO ) ) > 0
THEN '-'||BILL.STATUS ELSE BILL.STATUS END ) ELSE ( CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '-1' ELSE '-'||BILL.STATUS END ) END AS PROGRESS_CODE, CASE WHEN TRHD.REF_PAY_NO IS NULL THEN ( CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '승인' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ICOYTRHD WHERE PAY_NO IN ( SELECT REF_PAY_NO FROM ICOYTRHD WHERE REF_PAY_NO IS NOT NULL AND REF_PAY_NO = TRHD.PAY_NO ) ) > 0
THEN DECODE(BILL.STATUS_TXT, NULL, '전송대기' ,'취소'||BILL.STATUS_TXT)
ELSE DECODE(BILL.STATUS_TXT, NULL, '전송대기' ,BILL.STATUS_TXT) END ) ELSE ( CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '취소승인' ELSE DECODE(BILL.STATUS_TXT, NULL, '취소 전송대기' ,'취소'|| BILL.STATUS_TXT) END ) END AS PROGRESS_CODE_TXT,
TXHD.SIGN_STATUS, (SELECT PURCHASE_ID FROM ICOYIVHD WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND INV_NO = TRDT.INV_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PURCHARSE_ID, GETUSERNAMELOC(TXHD.HOUSE_CODE, (SELECT PURCHASE_ID FROM ICOYIVHD WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND INV_NO = TRDT.INV_NO AND ROWNUM = 1)) AS PURCHARSE_NAME, --TXHD.ADD_USER_ID AS PURCHARSE_ID, --GETUSERNAMELOC(TXHD.HOUSE_CODE, TXHD.ADD_USER_ID) AS PURCHARSE_NAME, BILL.PUBCODE, BILL.NTS_ISSUEID, POHD.SUBJECT,
CASE WHEN TRHD.REF_PAY_NO IS NULL THEN ( CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '승인' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ICOYTRHD WHERE PAY_NO IN ( SELECT REF_PAY_NO FROM ICOYTRHD WHERE REF_PAY_NO IS NOT NULL AND REF_PAY_NO = TRHD.PAY_NO ) ) > 0
THEN DECODE(BILL.STATUS_TXT, NULL, '전송대기' ,'취소'||BILL.STATUS_TXT)
ELSE DECODE(BILL.STATUS_TXT, NULL, '전송대기' ,BILL.STATUS_TXT) END ) ELSE ( CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '취소승인' ELSE DECODE(BILL.STATUS_TXT, NULL, '취소 전송대기' ,'취소'|| BILL.STATUS_TXT) END ) END AS H_PROGRESS_CODE_TXT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRHD.ADD_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS H_ADD_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TXHD.TAX_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS H_TAX_DATE, TXHD.TAX_NO AS H_TAX_NO, TRDT.INV_NO AS H_INV_NO, GETCOMPANYNAMELOC(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE,TRHD.VENDOR_CODE,'S') AS H_VENDOR_NAME, TXHD.SUP_IRS_NO AS H_SUP_IRS_NO, CASE WHEN TXHD.TAX_APP_NO IS NULL THEN BILL.NTS_ISSUEID ELSE TXHD.TAX_APP_NO END AS H_TAX_APP_NO, TXHD.SUP_AMT AS H_SUP_AMT, TXHD.VAT_AMT AS H_TAX_AMT, TXHD.SUP_AMT + TXHD.VAT_AMT AS H_TOT_AMT, GETICOMCODE1(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE,'M400',TRHD.TAX_DIV) AS H_TAX_DIV_TXT, GETUSERNAMELOC(TXHD.HOUSE_CODE, (SELECT PURCHASE_ID FROM ICOYIVHD WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND INV_NO = TRDT.INV_NO AND ROWNUM = 1)) AS H_PURCHARSE_NAME, POHD.SUBJECT AS H_SUBJECT, '' AS H_PO_CREATE_DATE, TXHD.KTGRM AS KTGRM, TXHD.PROC_DEPT AS PROC_DEPT, (SELECT DEPT_NAME_LOC FROM ICOMOGDP WHERE HOUSE_CODE = TXHD.HOUSE_CODE AND DEPT = TXHD.PROC_DEPT) PROC_DEPT_NM FROM ICOYTXHD TXHD INNER JOIN ICOYTRDT TRDT ON TXHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TXHD.TAX_NO = TRDT.TAX_NO INNER JOIN ICOYTRHD TRHD ON TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND TRHD.PAY_NO = TRDT.PAY_NO AND TRHD.HOUSE_CODE = ${session.HOUSE_CODE} AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('V','C','I', 'B')
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PUBCODE , RESSEQ , NTS_ISSUEID , STATUS , CASE WHEN LOADSTATUS = '0' THEN '전송대기' WHEN LOADSTATUS = '1' THEN (CASE WHEN STATUS = '30' THEN '미확인' WHEN STATUS = '35' THEN '미승인' WHEN STATUS = '50' THEN '승인' WHEN STATUS = '60' THEN '거부(반려)' WHEN STATUS = '65' THEN '수신 취소요청' WHEN STATUS = '66' THEN '발신 취소요청' WHEN STATUS = '99' THEN '발급취소' END) ELSE '전송오류 ' || '[' || LOADSTATUS || ']' END AS STATUS_TXT FROM ( SELECT SB.RESSEQ , EH.STATUS , SB.PUBCODE , SB.LOADSTATUS , SB.NTS_ISSUEID FROM SALEEBILL SB , ( SELECT ORDER_SEQ , PUBCODE , STATUS FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY PUBCODE ORDER BY STATUSDATE DESC) AS ORDER_SEQ , PUBCODE , STATUSDATE , STATUS FROM EB_HISTORY )WHERE ORDER_SEQ = 1 )EH WHERE SB.PUBCODE = EH.PUBCODE(+) ) )BILL ON TXHD.TAX_NO = BILL.RESSEQ, ICOYCNDT CNDT, ICOYBDHD BDHD, ICOYPOHD POHD, ICOMMTGL MTGl WHERE 1=1
AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('P','E','B')

LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PUBCODE , RESSEQ , STATUS , NTS_ISSUEID , CASE WHEN LOADSTATUS = '0' THEN '전송대기' WHEN LOADSTATUS = '1' THEN (CASE WHEN STATUS = '30' THEN '미확인' WHEN STATUS = '35' THEN '미승인' WHEN STATUS = '50' THEN '승인' WHEN STATUS = '60' THEN '거부(반려)' WHEN STATUS = '65' THEN '수신 취소요청' WHEN STATUS = '66' THEN '발신 취소요청' WHEN STATUS = '99' THEN '발급취소' END) ELSE '전송오류 ' || '[' || LOADSTATUS || ']' END AS STATUS_TXT FROM ( SELECT SB.RESSEQ , EH.STATUS , SB.PUBCODE , SB.LOADSTATUS , SB.NTS_ISSUEID FROM SALEEBILL SB , ( SELECT ORDER_SEQ , PUBCODE , STATUS FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY PUBCODE ORDER BY STATUSDATE DESC) AS ORDER_SEQ , PUBCODE , STATUSDATE , STATUS FROM EB_HISTORY )WHERE ORDER_SEQ = 1 )EH WHERE SB.PUBCODE = EH.PUBCODE(+) ) )BILL ON TXHD.TAX_NO = BILL.RESSEQ, ICOYCNDT CNDT, ICOYBDHD BDHD WHERE 1=1
AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('P','E','B')
AND TXHD.COMPANY_CODE = $S{vendor_code} AND TXHD.ADD_DATE BETWEEN $S{from_date} AND $S{to_date} AND TXHD.TAX_DATE BETWEEN $S{tax_from_date} AND $S{tax_to_date} AND TXHD.PROGRESS_CODE = $S{progress_code} AND TRHD.TAX_DIV = $S{tax_div} AND (TXHD.TAX_APP_NO LIKE '%' || $S{tax_app_no} || '%' OR BILL.NTS_ISSUEID LIKE '%' || $S{tax_app_no} || '%') AND TXHD.SIGN_STATUS = $S{sign_status} AND TXHD.ADD_USER_ID = $S{ctrl_person_id} AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM ICOYIVHD WHERE INV_NO = TRDT.INV_NO AND PURCHASE_ID = $S{purchase_id}) AND TRDT.HOUSE_CODE = CNDT.HOUSE_CODE(+) AND TRDT.PO_NO = CNDT.PO_NO (+) AND TRDT.PO_SEQ = CNDT.PO_SEQ (+) AND CNDT.HOUSE_CODE = BDHD.HOUSE_CODE(+) AND CNDT.RFQ_NO = BDHD.BID_NO (+) AND CNDT.RFQ_COUNT = BDHD.BID_COUNT (+) AND BDHD.BID_TYPE = $S{bid_type_c}

SELECT TXHD.TAX_NO, WBSINF.WBS_NAME, TRHD.VENDOR_CODE, GETCOMPANYNAMELOC(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE,TRHD.VENDOR_CODE,'S') AS VENDOR_NAME, TXHD.SUP_IRS_NO, TRHD.TAX_DIV, GETICOMCODE1(TRHD.HOUSE_CODE,'M400',TRHD.TAX_DIV) AS TAX_DIV_TXT, GETICOMCODE1(TXHD.HOUSE_CODE,'M010',(SELECT PAY_TERMS FROM ICOYPOHD WHERE HOUSE_CODE = TRDT.HOUSE_CODE AND PO_NO = TRDT.PO_NO ) ) AS PAY_TERMS_DESC, TXHD.SUP_AMT, TXHD.PAY_END_DATE, SUM(TRDT.TAX_AMT) AS TAX_AMT, TXHD.SUP_AMT + SUM(TRDT.TAX_AMT) AS TOT_AMT
